text:
Hello.
What's the best way to make a feature request ?
Hi Amrou, you can write a post in the ideas forum and then link to it here so people can upvote it! The more upvotes, the more visibility and recognition
Can you think for a reason why a form would not redirect to it’s redirectUrl parameter?

I meant custom event tracking in HS... also worth a look :stuck_out_tongue: right now requires the reporting add-on or some other higher tier, but seems like a great CTA alternative IMO from at least a reporting perspective.
Any great examples of blogs made with HubSpot that aren’t in the theme gallery? Looking for inspiration

I took a blog template and customized it to create this one. One of my pet peeves is blog home page/category pages (tags) etc have duplicate content. To get around that I have a meta description made and then inject that into the page as the snippet writeup. <https://www.pageonepower.com/linkarati>
<@U01NW31S9EH>?? ^^ Any insights would be much appreciated!
I have an open support ticket but no news so far…
Hi <@UDLS0CYPP> - this is like my first time logging into Slack since March so really late to this. I freelance but am on maternity leave at the moment :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks <@UBT0AHWLD>!

*is anyone available for a quick turnaround template email design? finalized template by EOD tomorrow, Thursday?* 
_design is finalized and assets are ready, just need someone to implement in HubSpot!_

Unless you go for something very simple, you’re better off implementing a special system that offers this functionality. You would end up building too much functionality yourself. 

The HubSpot Community site uses Khoros
